sentences.en: He loves entertaining his friends with ribald stories.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢用下流故事来逗他的朋友们开心.

sentences.en: The answer was lost in a shout of ribald laughter.
sentences.cn: 回答被一阵下流的狂笑声掩盖了.

sentences.en: This ribald ad by Durex works the participation angle.
sentences.cn: 杜蕾斯的这个猥琐的广告还挺注重用户参与的.

words.tran_cn: 猥亵的话；粗俗下流的言语

trans.tran_en: ribald remarks or jokes are humorous, rude, and about sex

trans.tran_cn: 言谈粗俗的人；说下流话的人
